metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7494

Platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for Raspberry Pi 12 SP2
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP2

metadata.Description: Samba since version 3.5.0 and before 4.6.4, 4.5.10 and 4.4.14 is vulnerable to remote code execution vulnerability, allowing a malicious client to upload a shared library to a writable share, and then cause the server to load and execute it.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP3 is installed
